trek-1.name: laguna 69 trek
trek-1.description: A short but rewarding hike, a stunning turquoise glacial lake surrounded by towering peaks.

trek-2.name: huayhuash circuit trek
trek-2.description: Embark on an epic journey through the remote mountain range, known for its beauty and high passes.

trek-3.name: pastoruri glacier trek
trek-3.description: A short but fascinating trek where you can witness the effects of glacial retreat.
